summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 26258, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Erie Avenue, from East Alder Street to the north line of Leschi Park, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, constructing concrete sidewalks, and providing for the necessary surface drainage; all in accordance with Resolution No. 2871, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle," approved February 4th, 1911.
